name: JASTapi
short_description:
NST is the foundation of the developement of set theory(uses a natural language to describe sets).In NST we assume the existence of some given domain
of `objects`, out of which we may build sets.A set is a collection of objects,it does not really matter what these objects are.Objects are formally known as elements or members of their respective sets.A set does not need to be finite, for example ,3 is an element of the set of all odd numbers . The main interest in this project is to implement the behavior of the set.An API is a source code-based specif cation which is used as an interface by software components to communicate with each other.The API will include specif cations for functions, data structures, object classes and variables. Since the API being developed is language dependent(only available by using the syntax and elements of a particular language).The API specification form will be that of the Java libraries.
summary: Design and implementation of a Java API for Naive Set Theory(NST).
